title: Testimonials
description: Share your own feedback and see what others are saying about Las Vegas Integrative Medicine, trusted Naturopathic Doctors, Acupuncture & Chinese Medicine & Integrative & Functional Medicine providing care to Las Vegas, NV.
cleaned_text: I was referred to Dr. Grace Im for herniated disc treatment. Sometimes I would feel better, worse, or not much effect but after about 10 sessions I noticed a trend of more good days than bad and I did not need to rely on my recovery methods as much. I had a real improvement in my range of motion due to her treatments. Her office was clean, she wore gloves when touching me, and there are several other providers there when her schedule is full. The front desk staff Alisa and Brianna are both very nice and professional. I had acupuncture, electrical stimulation with acupuncture needles, massage with oil, and cupping performed. The treatments relaxed me and helped me so I would recommend Grace to anyone in pain. Terry .. |
